name: albert bernabe
text: Great service. Fast turn around and great price. I will recommend to friends and Family. Abu is my new computer guy.

name: Guy Presson
text: Super nice guy, more than willing to work with you and great at what he does! üëç

name: Gary McMurry
text: Great Owner, great customer service and reasonable prices for proper computer repairs, upgrades and security of old and new machines as well.

name: ryan lindsay
text: Quick, efficient and friendly guy who communicates well

name: Steve Perkins
text: I paid this company over six hundred dollars to get my computer up to participate and lifetime service. They have worked on twice, it still isn't working right and they say I can't get more than one hundred back because they don't warrant their products. I wouldn't let them talk me into their services unless you have money to throw away. I purchased a one year plan in Feb and upgraded in April. Like I said don't waste your money

name: Abu Abdul-Maalik
text: Great services, affordable, and honest repairs.
